version_description: Fixes a bug on iPhone 6s/6s+ that prevented switching a photo to full-screen mode (by tap).
Increased stability due to significantly improved memory footprint.

- Settings to show more photos per page (works only for newer iPhones with enough memory).
- Zooming improved.
Reduced default number of images per page to 400 (can be changed in settings of app) to avoid crashes due to low memory, as reported by a few users.
Reduced default number of images per page to 400 (can be changed in settings of app) to avoid crashes due to low memory, as reported by a few users.

Performance improved.
iPhone X support.

Complete reimplementation with many new features:
- the app supports an arbritary number of photos/videos - no more limits to single pages like before.
- since the color/time sorting feature considers all photos/videos (and may take a few minutes in worst case), an own 'analyze' function is provided on the main screen. However, every new photo/video does only need to be analyzed once. 
- the screen is now fully utilized on iPad too (universal app).
- the portrait mode has been significantly improved and shows either a group of rings or a full cylinder (based on your choice).
- new app icon.
- way better performance!

Ring automatically loads after startup.
Gap to indicate start/end of ring (option).
Auto-rotate ring (option).
Bugfixes.

Support for Augmented Reality (AR).
Auto-rotation of ring as new feature.
You can now also delete a photo in the full screen view.
The settings of the ring are saved and restored.

Support for Augmented Reality (AR).
Auto-rotation of ring as new feature.
You can now also delete a photo in the full screen view.
Adjustable interaction speed.
The settings of the ring are saved and restored.
Dark mode support.
Augmented Reality (AR) view optimized.
Augmented Reality (AR) View optimized.
Augmented Reality (AR) View optimized.
Fixes an issue where the wrong picture was deleted or shared.
Fixes an issue that caused the app to hang on startup on some devices.
Analysis time improved.
Solves an issue that caused the app to hang on some devices when downloading large photos from iCloud.
Solves an issue that caused the app to hang on some devices when downloading large photos from iCloud.
See Through feature ("Far Side of the Ring") available, which can be used with a long press gesture.

Pinch-to-Zoom as new default (can be set in Ring-Settings).
In Augmented Reality (AR) the radius of the ring can be changed from 10cm to 3m (by using pinch).

Pinch-to-Zoom further optimized.
Ring Auto-Rotate (Presentation Mode) now also supports automatic ring navigation (change in settings).
Home indicator will be hidden if there is no interaction.
"Restore in-app purchases" fixed.
"Show Photo in Time View" / "Show Photo in Color View" feature fixed.
